location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 80 to William Digges Latouche, Resident at Bussora [Basra], from Edward Galley at Bushire

mods.abstract: Discusses administrative matters and confirms that Shaikh Rashed has left Gulfar with a large force in order to assist the Imam of Muscat's sons. An additional note on 15 May 1781 reports the arrival of the Betsy,commanded by Captain William Morris, and news that General Cook has captured a fort belonging to Heydar Ally [Hyder Ali]. Shipped by the Betsy.
